EmailTemplate.name: SCN Rejected by SHP Enrollment QA
EmailTemplate.subject: Sold Case Notification is not Approved - {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c} {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your Sold Case Notification {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Name} for {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c}, {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been returned for review and re-submission by the SHP Enrollment Team for the following:
Reason: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Thank you.
